<h1 align="center">
  James Hernandez's Portfolio Website
</h1>

The purpose of this website is to explain and demonstrate technical and design acumen I have acquired over my career.

This project uses npm, react, graphql, and gatsbyjs.

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Install node modules.**

    Use the Gatsby CLI to create a new site, specifying the hello-world starter.

    ```shell
    # install all node modules
    npm install
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd my-hello-world-starter/
    gatsby develop
    ```
